meanings.definition: To march with heavy gear over difficult terrain.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers were yomping through the muddy jungle.
meanings.sent2: We will be yomping up the steep mountain path tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: After yomping for hours, they finally reached the campsite.
meanings.sent4: Yomping through life's challenges can make us stronger.
meanings.sent5: The image of soldiers yomping in the rain stayed with me.

meanings.sent1: The yomping across the desert drained their energy.
meanings.sent2: She completed the yomping despite the blister on her foot.
meanings.sent3: The yomping turned into a race when they spotted a food truck.
meanings.sent4: The yomping felt like a never-ending journey through time.
meanings.sent5: The yomping in the marathon left him breathless but proud.
